if.if: AND (title LIKE CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{keyword}, '%')) OR content LIKE CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{keyword}, '%')))

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice (notice_no, title, content) VALUES(notice_seq.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{content} )
mapper.select: SELECT count(notice_no) FROM notice WHERE notice_no > 0

SELECT notice_no, title, content, reg_date FROM ( SELECT notice_no, title, content, reg_date, ROWNUM as rnum FROM ( SELECT notice_no, title, content, reg_date FROM notice WHERE notice_no > 0
ORDER BY notice_no DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{page} * #{sizePerPage} ) WHERE rnum >= (#{page} * #{sizePerPage}) - (#{sizePerPage} - 1)
SELECT notice_no, title, content, reg_date FROM notice WHERE notice_no = #{noticeNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE notice SET title = #{title}, content = #{content} WHERE notice_no = #{noticeNo}
